patthana16.61:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.61:1.1_2: anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo
patthana16.61:1.1_3: ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:2.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.61:2.1_2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva
patthana16.61:2.1_3: nano ca āsavo naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
